summary: A test suite that validates the core functionality and performance optimizations of the ControlNet pipeline integrated with the Stable Diffusion XL model, covering inference precision, attention strategies, batch handling, component serialization, multi‑prompt support, resource offloading, and accelerated attention kernels.
business_intent: Guarantee that the ControlNet‑SDXL integration operates correctly and efficiently in production environments, providing rapid verification of key features and optimizations to reduce regression risk and improve deployment confidence.
